pros: Some of the staff were exemplary, for example Traci Chapman, Supervisor and Keith Chapman RN in ER, now in ICU. There was, in general, an attitude of caring about what was best for the patient.
cons: Some of the equipment could have been updated, and communication between departments needed improvement.

job_title: Certified Phlebotomy Technician (CPT) in Gassaway, WV
cons: Poor management for every department and hospital in general. Salary is extremely poor especially in comparison to the time, dedication, work, compassion and more put into the job.

job_title: STaff Registered Nurse in Weston, WV
pros: Small hospital, is definitely travel friendly for the most part
I have a dayshift position, but that is not the norm
cons: low pay scale. I've been here, full time for 7 years. In that time I've had a $.75 raise.
